summary: Comprehensive testing of SkillBridge platform with 12 professional categories implementation. Backend API shows 96.1% success rate with all categories working correctly. Frontend displays all categories properly with functional filtering.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error for general workers endpoint
minor_bugs.impact: General worker listing not working, but filtered endpoints work fine

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error for general jobs endpoint
minor_bugs.impact: General job listing not working, but filtered endpoints work fine

ui_bugs.issue: Could not complete full registration flow testing
ui_bugs.selector: User type selection not found in signup form

passed_tests: Categories API returns all 12 categories with subcategories
Homepage displays sample categories (Handy Work, Development & IT, AI Services)
Categories page shows all 12 categories correctly
Hire Talent page filters include all categories (13 options)
Find Work page filters include all categories (13 options)
Worker profile creation with new categories (development_it, ai_services)
Job posting with new categories works
Category filtering works for workers and jobs
Worker profile detail page navigation works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the 520 errors on general /api/workers and /api/jobs endpoints. The filtered endpoints work fine, suggesting the issue is with unfiltered queries. Also verify registration form has proper user type selection.
